name: One Man's Trash is Another's Treasure
name_original: One Man's Trash is Another's Treasure
description:
Want a sustainable business model that combines the best of environmentalism and capitalism? In this action (and slightly educational?) singleplayer game, run a shop straight out of the local back alley trash bins! 

Thrift through the trash to find items that remotely fits the customer's description of what they want, and chuck it at their face to make a sale. Make sure the customer satisfaction meter is high though or else it's game over and you'll get reported to the city. 

Credits:

  • Anita He
  • Camille Rail
  • Erik Polasek
  • Francis Boisclair
  • Gary Ng
  • Steven Lam

Made in 48 hours for GGJ 2021, the theme was Lost and Found.
